Class Task

java.lang.Object
com.example.simple.jira.model.domain.Task
public final class Task extends Object
Immutable representation of a single task within a project
Version:
1.0
Author:
spacedesk2

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(int taskId, String title, String description, TaskStatus status, TaskPriority priority, int projectId)
      Creates a new immutable task instance
      Parameters:
      taskId - identifier generated by the repository
      title - short summary of the task
      description - detailed description of the work item
      status - current workflow status
      priority - priority level of the task
      projectId - owning project identifier

    • withStatus

      public Task withStatus(TaskStatus newStatus)
      Creates a copy of the task with a new status
      Parameters:
      newStatus - updated workflow status
      Returns:
      task copy reflecting the new status

    • withPriority

      public Task withPriority(TaskPriority newPriority)
      Creates a copy of the task with updated priority
      Parameters:
      newPriority - new priority level
      Returns:
      task copy reflecting the new priority

    • withDetails

      public Task withDetails(String newTitle, String newDescription)
      Creates a copy of the task with updated textual description
      Parameters:
      newTitle - new title value
      newDescription - new description value
      Returns:
      task copy with updated textual fields
